summary: Michael is an important angelic figure in several religions, including Judaism, Christianity, Islam, and the Baháʼí Faith. He is often described as the leader of the angels and is known for his role in protecting Israel. In Christian texts, Michael is mentioned in the Book of Revelation, where he fights against Satan. He is considered a powerful and brave warrior angel. People have believed in Michael's existence since ancient times, and he is still revered today.
title: Michael (archangel)
